text: The Apartment is a 1960 American romance movie directed by Billy Wilder, and starring Jack Lemmon and Shirley MacLaine. It is about climbing the corporate ladder and seduction. It won five Academy Awards including Best Picture. Due to adult themes and infidelity, the movie was controversial in its time. == Other websites == * Category:1960 comedy-drama movies Category:1960 romantic comedy movies Category:1960 romantic drama movies Category:Adultery in movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies directed by Billy Wilder
title: The Apartment
